text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Beep, beep, beep... Beep...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All righty! Starting today, my life as a<n>Tracen Academy
student finally<n>begins!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right! If it's okay with you,<n>Suzuka, do you want
to go to school<n>toge—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: She's already gone?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Her tracksuit's not here, so maybe<n>she went for an early
morning run?<n>Wow, she really wakes up early...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I wonder if she'd let me run with her<n>again if I asked.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Maybe when she gets back, I'll work<n>up the courage to
ask. Then<n>afterwards... Hee hee!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah! I gotta get going! If I keep<n>daydreaming, I'm gonna be
late!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bueno!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hello, greetings, and salutations! I've<n>been waiting for our
bold new<n>challenger to step into the ring!<n>Bienvenida,
Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh, ah, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh... Do excuse her for startling you.<n>I'll be sure to give her
a stern talking<n>to afterwards.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: My lecture senses are tingling!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I'm Grass Wonder, and this is El<n>Condor Pasa. It's a
pleasure to meet<n>you, Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah, nice to meet you too! So... is it<n>okay if I call you
Grass and El then?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Sí! Oh, and if ya feel like it, I wouldn't<n>mind ya taggin' "the
world's<n>strongest racer" to my name either!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Anda! Class is about to start! Hasta<n>luego, Spe! See ya
later!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah, see you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Did I just make some friends?<n>Yeees! I should keep this
up for class<n>and training too!)

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
All right, then, Special Week, please<n>answer number five...
Special Week?<n>Hey, are you listening?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yes?! S-sorry, I was copying notes<n>from the board!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(So fast! Back home, the teacher<n>always met my pace since
I was the<n>only student. I didn't think classes in<n>the big
city'd be goin' a mile a<n>minute!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
This is bad, bad, bad, Spe! There's<n>gonna be a quiz in math
class next!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what?! A quiz?! Wh-wh-what<n>should I do? I'm not
ready at all!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It's times like these where one must<n>remain calm, Spe. The
contents of the<n>test will all be fundamentals, so you'll<n>be
fine.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Grass... Oh, thank you so much!<n>That's right, if it's the
basics then it'll<n>be okay!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Or at least that's what I'd say if Iknew the basics!)

text_block_list.name: Teacher A (Man)
text_block_list.text:
Special Week... Now, I know you're<n>our new transfer, but
this score is... I<n>think I'll have to assign you some<n>extra
work.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm sooooorry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Don't think too much about it, Spe.<n>It's still your first day,
it's normal not<n>to have a solid grip on things yet.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she's right! There's no use in<n>feelin' down! In any
case, this<n>afternoon is...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The highly anticipated! The<n>long-awaited! The moment
we've all<n>been waiting for... Practice tiiiiime!<n>We'll be
training our racing skills!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Training! Yeah... You're totally right!<n>So what if class went
bad? Surely<n>training will go much better!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh my. It seems Spe will be in this<n>group for the scrimmage.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No way! Now I'm feelin' extra<n>pumped! I heard her results
in the<n>entrance exam were super amazing!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I'm also looking forward to it. I<n>wonder what kind of
running style she<n>has.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ka-thunk!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... Huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, she's a little behind the middle.<n>Think that makes her
a late surger?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: She seems somewhat... stiff.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(There are four furlongs to go! I'd<n>better kick it into high
gear here!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaah—hm! Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Wh-what?! No way, why are my legs<n>so heavy?! I-I
shouldn't be tired yet!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Guess she ran out of gas...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hm... She's likely not used to this<n>track... Then there are
also nerves to<n>consider... Those combined might<n>already
have her drained.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hmm... So that's why her running<n>feels off. Qué pena...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sigh... First class and nowtraining too? Everything's gone sohorribly...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, Spe. Remember, it's still<n>your first day. I think it's
best if you<n>take your time getting used to<n>everything.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Graaaaass! You still haven't changed<n>yet?! Don't tell me
you've forgotten<n>your promise, your sworn oath!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Calm down. If it's our partner running<n>you're referring to,
then, no, I haven't.<n>You'll have to excuse us, Spe. We'll<n>
see you tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh... Y-yes, see you tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Both of them are so amazing.<n>Classes during the morning
and<n>training in the afternoon. Then more<n>training after all
that.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I wonder if I'll be able to keep up...<n>Mom...)
